# mvbcf

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

Welcome to the mvbcf R package! This package is currently a work in progress so please check back regularly to keep an eye on progress!

This R package implements the Multivariate Bayesian Causal Forest Model introduced in McJames et al. 2024:

McJames, N., Oâ€™Shea, A., Goh, Y. C. & Parnell, A. (2024). Bayesian causal forests for multivariate outcomes: Application to Irish data from an international large scale education assessment. *Journal of the Royal Statistical Society Series A: Statistics in Society*, 1-23. https://doi.org/10.1093/jrsssa/qnae049.

See below for details on installation. For worked examples and quick-start guides showing how to use the package, check out the vignettes and other materials.

## Installation

You can install the development version of mvbcf with the following:

```{r, eval=FALSE}

if (!require("devtools")) {
  install.packages("devtools")
}
install_github("Nathan-McJames/mvbcf")
```
